documentation.text:
@notice returns all of the deployed escrow contracts
 @return a list of deployed escrow contracts

params._escrowAccount: the escrow account to manage the funds
params._seller: the account which receives the funds

returns._0: a list of deployed escrow contracts

createEscrow(address,address).notice: creates a new escrow contract and adds it to a list

getDeployedEscrowContract(uint256).notice: return the escrow contract at the given index

getDeployedEscrowContracts().notice: returns all of the deployed escrow contracts
